biotools.summary: The Internal Transcribed Spacer 2 Database (ITS2) includes a homology based RNA structure prediction algorithm which allows the detection and secondary structure prediction of ITS2 sequences. This resource also contains more than 25,000 pre-calculated secondary structures for currently known ITS2 sequences that can be searched and browsed via taxonomy.

bioschemas.name: ITS2
